item.honkytones.floppydisk.title: Floppy Disk Options
item.honkytones.gui.file.name: MIDI File name
honkytones.error.parse: There was an error parsing the data.
honkytones.error.url: URL is not valid or request took too long! Timing out.
honkytones.error.missing_yt-dl: youtube-dl executable is missing or was denied!
honkytones.error.ffmpeg: ffmpeg executables are missing or were denied / incompatible!
honkytones.error.midi-sequencer: Couldn't get the OS default midi sequencer!
honkytones.error.midi-missing: was not found or is not a midi file!
honkytones.error.long_stream: Stream is longer than X minutes!
honkytones.error.file_access: There was an issue opening the file!
honkytones.error.file_written: An unexpected error happened trying to write the MIDI!
honkytones.message.file_written: MIDI File (X) has been successfully written!
honkytones.help.write_device_info: Overwrite the instrument name with the MIDI device name and channel.
honkytones.help.restore_defaults: Restore commands to their default values.
honkytones.help.keep_downloads: Keep downloads permanently when requesting web content.
honkytones.help.keep_videos: Keep videos when requesting web content
honkytones.help.debug_mode: Show debug messages on console and networking stuff.
honkytones.help.mobs_playing_delay: Change the delay of mobs playing (Has to be > 120).
honkytones.help.tip1: If you click the clean button on the menu§2 3 times§f you can reset the instrument's name.
honkytones.help.tip2: Instruments might have§2 other uses§f than just playing sounds.
honkytones.help.tip3: You can§2 force attack§f interactive mobs by§2 sneaking§f while attacking.
honkytones.help.tip4: Floppy disk §2local midi§f files will be localized by the§2 last player§f that picked it up.
honkytones.help.tip5: A floppy track can be stopped by dragging it out of the slot in the Music Player.
honkytones.help.tip6: Play / pause can be done with redstone trigger.
honkytones.help.tip7: Music players can play less than 20 min streams and midi files.
honkytones.help.tip8: A digital console can record midi and play with the keyboard keys in case you don't have controller.
honkytones.help.tip9: A musical storage can store honkytones stacks and has a couple more internal features.
honkytones.help.tip10: You can use the sound settings player slider to change the global mod volume.
honkytones.help.tip11: You can use mute players by using an instrument and sneaking.
